runs.comm: Panyangara begins well with a lovely length delivery outside of off which is not tampered with

Panyangara is at it again! Gets this one to nip in from just outside off on a length, with Dwayne playing outside of the line of it as it burst through the gate. Panyangara walks a couple of steps before shaking his money maker
fuller one which nearly gets inside-edged onto the stumps as this streaks away through backward square. Bit timid from Marlon as he brought down the blade

fuller one which seems to shape into Gayle's pads as it strikes in line. There were definitely two sounds as this made impact. Given not out initially, but they want to have a review. This might be dead on folks as the sound actually emanated from hitting the two pads of the batsmen on the way over. Gayle could really be in big trouble here, but would you believe it, it is going to be not out because hitting the wickets is down to the umpire's call, but it was ever so close. Dodged a bullet there
now pushes through a fuller length across the big Jamaican which he is slightly late on as he followed after it

this over has had it all. Now Gayle gets away a rather awkward chip through midwicket as this goes up for a while, but with no fielders in the vicinity, ends up landing safe. Very, very nervy start for West Indies
Zimbabwe looking very good this afternoon as he gets in a lovely back of a length which shapes back upon pitching outside of off, with the batsman drawn into playing it with the initial angle
this time gets bat on it to a delivery along a similar length, but a bit closer to the body this time. This one goes away through third man
length on the pads which ends up hitting the pad of Gayle as it squirts away to the leg side
able to get away Chatara through third man once more at the top of the bounce
length pushed through on middle and leg which strikes in line, but seems to have got an inside-edge first
fires in a fuller length going across Gayle which is allowed to carry through to the keeper
away swinging delivery brought up on a fuller length just outside off. Defended away to the off side on the front foot
shortens the length a touch on middle as this is clipped away to the leg side
able to keep out this full, straight delivery on the stumps
drives this fullish length outside of off towards the mid-off fielder
brings the bat down to this fuller length outside of off stump

may have come out wrong here for Panyangara as he dishes up a wide, full delivery which Samuels is able to bludgeon through the line down long off, with this one beating the fielder from mid-off comprehensively to the boundary
slants in a fullish length across the left-hander which is not flirted with
didn't quite middle this chip over mid-on, with this hovering dangerously over the fielder as he attempted to go over. Ends up finding the boundary in the end
this time opts for the pull shot through backward square as he is able to rotate the strike
beauty of a delivery which tails away after pitching on and around off on a good length. Samuels drawn into playing the line, but only just
able to get away this fuller one outside of his off stump through to gully
overpitched on middle and off and driven firmly on the up by Gayle through mid-off, with the fielder putting a full dive to his left to cut off a certain boundary
gets this one to continue through with the line outside of off as Samuels went after it tentatively
crashes into the thigh pad of Samuels as he attempted a flick away to the leg side
tries to force one away through point, but picks out the fielder
has a wild go at this back of a length which swings in upon pitching, with Samuels removing one of his hands from the handle as he went through with the airy stroke
angles in a fullish length on middle and off which is driven firmly through long off for a boundary. Just eased into it as he met with the ball
gets nicely forward to this fuller one which threatens to duck into off stump
short enough for Gayle to throw his hands at, which he does with aplomb as he blazes away a drive through the covers off the back foot, with this screaming away to the boundary
looks like he is ready to go after the Zimbaweans as he hammers this fuller one towards mid-on
able to cover for the line of this one angling in to middle and off
advances down a touch before flicking away the fast bowler off his pads through backward square for a boundary. Has looked quite positive from the get-go here at the Manuka

this time looks to loft the pacer through extra-cover, but doesn't quite time this away as it holds up in the air over the region, with Chigumbura running from the position backwards within the ring to try and get to this, but the ball is far too ahead of him
this time gets away a pull through midwicket to pick up the single that keeps him on strike, much to the dismay of the Zimbabweans
allows this fuller one to go through to the keeper
opens the face to this one on off stump, with this squirted away square off the wicket
punches away the bowler towards point, but finds the fielder
has an airy slash to this back of a length outside of off, but is late on it
drives rather uppishly through the covers, with this one reined in just outside of the circle at extra-cover
removes one of his hands from the handle as this length delivery streaking in is dead-batted to the off side
clipped away towards midwicket, with the fielder pouncing onto this in a flash to deter the notion of a single
pushes out to this length delivery outside of off
covers the line of this length delivery nibbling in from outside of off
determined to build an innings here as he keeps out yet another length delivery
flicks away this length delivery off the pads towards fine leg
fires one in on the stumps which is glided away towards the third man region for one
is quite well on this fuller length pushed across him, as he went down on one knee to try and hammer this out of Canberra
gets away a chip through square leg to this fullish length on middle and leg, but didn't quite time this as he would have liked
slants in a fuller length across the left-hander which Gayle is late on as he offered a stroke
shortish length which he is quick to latch onto as he powers away a pull through midwicket
fuller one on middle and off which is struck away towards point
goes down to ground for what seems the umpteenth time as he fires in a fuller one which Gayle is not interested to lash out to, at least not this particular delivery...
length on off which is squirted away towards the fielder at point
delivers a bouncer which seems to follow Gayle as he weaves away from its path
is woefully late on this back of a length outside of off which he looked to cut away behind point
pushes out at this length which tapers away upon pitching outside of off
this time is able to pierce the gap at cover with a powerful slash to this short of a length which is afforded width by the bowler
tries to glide this short of a length through the slips, but picks one of them out in the end
able to negotiate this first one floated in on middle and off
tries to guide this past Williams towards mid-off, but picks out the fielder
gets forward only to drive this one away towards the man at mid-off
ends up hitting this one away to the same fielder, despite looking to turn this to the leg side
gets away with this half-trekker outside of off which Gayle tries to blitz away through point, but ends up being stopped by a valiant dive from the fielder
Gayle finally gets what he wants as he plants his foot to lift Williams high over long on with a big swing. Clean strike which travels the distance
fires in a fullish length on middle and off which is struck back to the bowler in his follow through
fires a wide down the leg side as the umpire gets to stretch his arms
allows this back of a length, wide of off, to go through to the keeper
rocks forward to keep out this fuller length from Elton
turns away this fuller length towards midwicket for a single
pushes across a fuller length which the batsman decides to leave alone
fuller one going across which he shoulders arms to
goes round the wicket to Samuels as this one is worked down to long off
back over the wicket to Gayle as the left-hander defends him to the off side
pierces the gap at extra-cover with a push off the back foot to pickup a brace
able to nurdle a single through long on to get to the other end
flights one in on middle and leg which is fended away to the leg side
is late on this one slipping down the leg side as he tried to tickle it past Brendan Taylor, but ends up being called a wide as he missed out
tries to force one past backward point, but the fielder is equal to the task
Samules looks like he might launch into this wide, short of a length delivery outside of off, but withdraws at the last moment
tries to clip away the bowler through midwicket, but picks out mid-on
delivers a length ball outside of off which Samuels tries to run down to third man, but can't make a connection on it
defends away the bowler close to the body on the leg side
slipping down leg once more as Samuels flicks away through backward square for a couple
gets away a thick outside edge through the slip region, but with no there there, turns out a safe option as third man comes round to field it
goes hard at this floater from Williams, with this bursting through the spinner as he tried to field the ball on the follow through. This ends up somewhere near long off
gets deep to punch the spinner down to long off
driven firmly down to long on this time for one
gets a good stride in before defending this one away to the leg side
this time gets back and across to short-arm jab this through long on
goes for the big shot through backward square as he seems to sweep this from outside off through the region
flicks his wrists to this length delivery outside of off through third man
fails to get away this fuller one on middle and leg
length delivery on the pads which is glanced away towards the leg side
fails to get away Elton through mid-off now as the ball eases up to the fielder
guides the bowler down to long off for a couple
lets this fuller one shaping away as it went across, through to the keeper
drifts in from outside leg which is fended away by the batsman
this time backs away and across to try and force one through mid-off
unable to get away the spinner on the leg side despite the attempt
once again picks out short backward square
gets deep in the crease to keep out this one turning in
continues with a leg-stump line as this time he misses the mark

dropped what an opportunity for the Zimbabweans! Samuels spoons away a glide straight to backward point, who gets forward before bobbling the chance after going for the dive. Raza goes down on his haunches, realising how crucial that was
not too good from Elton as he is called for a no-ball straight after the break. Free hit for Gayle
gets on one knee before clubbing away this one going across over extra-cover to pick up a six, but only just
drives this fuller one down to long off, with the man at mid-off putting in a dive to try and cut this off
looks to get one away to the leg side off the pads, but doesn't quite work out for him
gets across before tucking away Elton to the leg side

forces away this back of a length through mid-off, setting off like his life depended on it to the other end, and makes his ground despite a shy at this stumps as he brings up his 47th half-century. Perhaps he has been reading some cricinfo some lately?
fires in a yorker on middle and leg which is dug out by Samuels
driven away competently through extra-cover to get Marlon on strike
fails to get this leg-side delivery off the pads as he looked to whip it away
this time drives on the up to long off to rotate the strike
just fended away to the off side
works away a single through the off side to get to the other end
safely negotiates the final ball of the over
driven back to the bowler in his follow through
uses his feet to try and get down, with Elton seeing this one early as he slants it down leg, with Gayle then readjusting his stroke at the last moment to tickle this away through fine leg
this time gets to the other end with a push to the off side
delivers a bumper which has Marlon weaving away from its path. Was definitely not expecting it as he got away rather awkwardly
looks like he hangs on the back foot before getting forward at the last moment to keep out this length delivery
fuller one outside off which is forced away through the covers
driven back to the bowler to this one flighted in from outside leg
continues down the leg side now as Samuels fails to pick this up
seems to crash into the pads of the batsman as the ball rolls away to the leg side
defended by the batsman
gets down the track before steering this past the bowler to his right
keeps out this one from round the wicket
able to nurdle this one through the off side to get a single
defends away this length delivery going across to the off side
length on middle and leg which is worked away to the leg side
defended away to the off side by the big Jamaican
tries to get away the fast bowler through the leg side, but picks out backward square
drives this one fuller one going across, but straight to the man at mid-off
nurdles away a single through the leg side to this one pitched in on a fuller length
picks up a single through midwicket to get Samuels on strike
punched away now through the off side, but can't get it away in any space
this time works it away to the leg side
defended away by the batsman to the leg side
this time backs away to try and force one away through the covers, but picks out the fielder
shimmies down before guiding this one past Raza to long on
flatter one just outside of off which is slapped away to cover
pushes one quickly through the leg side as Samuels is able to pickup a single with a glance
pushes through a flatter one across Gayle which is punched away towards mid-off
fails to get away the spinner through midwicket
drives this one straight back at the bowler, who ends up deflecting it onto the non-striker's stumps after attempting to field the ball
blitzes one away on the front foot through cover, but finds the fielder right away
drives this one straight to mid-off
able to steer one down to long off to get Samuels back on the hot seat
vintage Samuels. Able to back away to cut away the bowler through cover to get away a boundary. Looked quite fluent as he pulled off the stroke
able to force one away past the bowler towards long on to get the big Jamaican on strike
eased away to long on as Samuels looked like he wanted two, but Gayle's casual glide down meant it was kept to just one
defended by the batsman as the rain continues to fall on the Manuka
tries to blaze away a boundary through point, but picks out the fielder
this time looks to attack through extra-cover, but is stopped again within the inner ring
traipses down before driving firmly along the ground to long off
and Gayle threatens to burst a few more water drops from the clouds as he hammers this flighted in on middle and off, with this being sent high over cow corner
Gayle has taken his cue from the ominous dark clouds overhead to bludgeon Kamungozi straight back over his head to bring up back-to-back sixes
darted on the stumps, Gayle looks to work it into the on-side, but can't connect, wears it on his pad, but the ball pitched outside leg
advances down before slamming this straight towards Raza, who is surprised as he tries to get away from it as it comes at such a rate of knots. Ends up somewhere near long on
floated up outside off, Gayle looks to drive and gets an inside edge that goes behind the wicket and beats the keeper as well, the batsmen take another run
blitzes away a drive through cover to pickup a couple
drives this one straight down to the bowler, with this escaping his clutches to roll away behind him towards the off side
eases away a single down to long off as he looks a bit more settled out there
clips away a single through square-leg, which becomes straightforward after the fielder nearby ends up mucking his chance as he tried to get to it
defends this floater on middle which seems to take an eternity to get to him
slaps away a single through cover to get Gayle back on strike
gets forward before slicing away this one towards point. Also gets Gayle to 9000 ODI runs. Only the second West Indian after Lara to get to the mark
punches away Hamilton through extra-cover, but is stopped by the fielder in the ring
ends up gliding this one away to backward point as Samuels continues to search for his timing
just gets away a punch through cover, with some slopping fielding from the close-in fielder affording him the luxury of a single
flatter and on the stumps. Samuels goes back in the crease and punches it to cover
able to get away a single down the leg side with a clip off the pads
just lobs this up to Gayle whose eyes light up as he is able to plant his foot and lift this over long on for six. This just seemed to climb higher as it went down
gets away a brace through long on to keep the strike
able to get away a single through the off side with a careful dab-and-run
looks to follow the line of this one slipping down leg, as he meant to paddle the delivery, but ends up running the bye as the keeper behind failed to get a grip on it
this time slips down Gayle's leg side as Gayle tries to help this down, but is late on the paddle
able to guide the spinner off the back foot through the extra-cover region fro one
defends this leg-side delivery from Hamilton to the aforementioned region
content to just ease this one pitched on off down to long off
slapped away off the back foot towards deep extra-cover
driven uppishly towards mid-off as he looked to get forward
doesn't quite get away this drive through the covers, with this ending up down at long off
opens the face to glide this through backward point for one
steers Raza through midwicket as he now moves to 49. Also brings up their 150-run stand
able to pickup a couple through third man thanks to this one turning away a fraction on Gayle, with the ball catching the edge as he pushed at
nurdles the spinner to the leg side as he gets to the other end
and moves to his 26th ODI fifty with a clip off the pads. Really needs to catch up on his strike rate as this effort has taken him 95 deliveries
simply defends Raza to the off side
content to defend this on the front foot to end the over
shortish and wide outside off. Samuels cuts it past a diving backward point, as the sweeper tidies up in the deep with the batsmen taking a couple
on a good length and outside off. Samuels puts his front foot forward and looks to drive it hard, and ends up getting a thick inside-edge onto the pad
fuller just outside off. Samuels drives it towards sweeper cover off the front foot
drop-and-run single from Gayle as he pushes this length delivery around off in front of cover
full and slightly wide outside off. Samuels goes for the drive once again, but the ball goes past his blade
on a good length and angling in on off. Samuels defends it back towards the bowler
covers the line for any turn from Raza on middle stump
flatter one pushed across by Raza which is defended away to the off side
able to defend this one comfortably with an angled blade
once again gets forward to defend Raza on middle stump
spears in one on middle which is dug out successfully by Gayle
able to secure a maiden against the likes of Gayle as the left-hander fends away this one turning in from outside off
drives this one past Hamilton to the man at long on
tries to glide one past backward point, but is unable to do so
Gayle once again struggles to get away Hamilton as he picks out mid-off
clips away this leg-side straddling delivery square off the wicket
drives this length delivery uppishly through cover, with this one slowing up in the outfield
guides one down to long off as they look to create a platform from which to launch a spirited attack
nurdled down past mid-on as he gets himself to 98
shuffles over a touch before averting to his original stance as he glances away Raza behind square
tries to force this past short mid-on, but picks out the man
guides away Raza through long on now to get just one away from a World Cup hundred
punches away the bowler, but unfortunately straight to him in his follow through
punches it back to Raza, who ends a lovely ten-over spell with figures of 0 for 45. Good day's work considering the calibre of batsmen he had to bowl to
and he gets himself to the mark with a forceful push off the back foot down to long on to get to his 22nd ODI hundred, and his first since June 2013!
defends this one from the bowler to the off side
looks to drive one through the covers, but is unable to beat the close-in field
short enough for Gayle to get after, but can't get it sufficiently wide of long on, who is able to stop this near the rope
glides away the bowler square off the wicket to pickup a single
Gayle signals his thirst for boundaries as he is able to flick Hamilton through backward square for six. Just seemed to sail so effortlessly into the stands
works away this leg-side slanting delivery through midwicket
steers away a single through mid-on as they saunter for another easy single
fails to get away this drive through long off. Samuels really has been very scratchy in this effort so far, almost akin to the special he produced against SL in the WC 2012 final
gets a bottom-edge to this one he was looking to thwack out of Canberra, but it was a half-hearted swing in the end
is well early on this bouncer which crashes into his right shoulder after he threw himself into the shot
gives himself some room to try and run this away through third man, but ends up hitting squarer to point
and he is greeted back to the crease with a swatted pull from Gayle to this short of a length. This was sent screaming away to midwicket in no time

picks his spot down the ground, but doesn't quite get it away as sweetly as he would have liked. There is a man at long on waiting for it, but this falls short of him. On top of that, this could have been a no-ball as Ian Gould mentions how close he had overstepped
Gayle in T20 mode as he gets a fuller one in his arc which he is able to flick high over midwicket to get yet another six

can't really call this a dropped chance as Panyangara did mighty well to try and get to this uppish chip from Gayle to this length delivery which seemed to bounce higher on Gayle that he would have liked, with Panyangara mere inches from clutching this as he went after it with a full dive, and two hands outstretched. Really close, but not enough in the end
this time Samuels gets in on the act as he is able to throw his hands at this short of a length wide of off, slamming this away through third man
gets away a single through long off to retain the strike
waits on this slower, length delivery, but is unable to get it past the close-in field through point

follows the batsman with this shorter one which Samuels ends up getting an inside-edge on as he tries to avoid the delivery. Won't mind the end result though as this streaks away through the fine leg boundary. Will certainly help boost his slumbering strike rate
able to swat away a single through long on to bring up the West Indies 200

looked to back away and clatter this shorter one out of the park, but ends up ducking under the delivery, with the keeper unable to hold onto it after it passed through, affording the Jamaican a single he probably didn't want in the first place
looking to back away and dab past backward point, but picks out the man
full toss slanting down leg which Samuels just gets away through to deep midwicket
slow bouncer which Gayle is unable to get under and away. Panyangara turns back to his mark, but only to see the wide signal called for height. Poor guy

dear, oh dear. Zimbabwe really hurting themselves here. Gayle able to get under this fuller length going across, slamming this high over long on. There is a man in the deep, who is able to get under it, but doesn't see the no-ball call from the umpire. Free hit for Gayle. It just isn't fair..

and Gayle almost makes him pay with a massive slog over square-leg, with this going to the man in the deep, much to the delight of the crowd who failed to pick up on the no-ball call from the umpire earlier
this time slices over the covers to get away a streaky brace
looking to bowl as straight as possible, but ends up splaying this down the leg side as Gayle cleared his front leg
throws himself and the kitchen sink at this slow bouncer, but is far too early into the stroke
able to work away the bowler for a single through extra-cover
slapped away square off the wicket as this lands to point after a couple of steep bounces
into position quickly to dispatch this shorter one high over the stands at cow corner. Another pull that is sent the distance. Gayle in a destructive mood now
waits on this fullish length wide of off before steering away through extra-cover
spears in a wider, full delivery which Gayle is able to pummel away through the line to find long off. Wanted two, but Raza is quickly on it to dissuade the second run
almost chops on this length delivery onto the stumps
Samuels able to beat the sweeper cover with a powerful scythe behind square. Has been the quiet partner off late with Gayle setting off fireworks at the other end
this time blitzes away a single through to deep extra-cover
length going across and smashed straight back over Hamilton's head for a biggie. Gayle looking in one of those moods where you simply don't want to be a bowler today
sees the vacant space at deep extra-cover and targets it with a bludgeon over the covers to pickup four
searching for the yorker and ends up dishing a very low full toss which is chipped uppishly towards long off
trying to strangle Samuels down the leg side, as this one just misses the mark
once again looking to keep that line, but strays too far
goes round the wicket now, but fails to keep the line he wants down leg as he errs down the wrong side
gets this one horribly wide of off now as he spears this across the batsman. Samuels tried to go after it, but really needed to do a lot to get it
looking for the blockhole and instead gives up a low full toss which Samuels just guides down on the full to long off
able to drive one away through extra-cover to get Samuels back on strike
Elton losing the plot here as he delivers yet another wide, this time down leg
just about digs out this yorker on middle and off
overpitched and sent straight to the high heavens by Gayle as this one lands after some time over cow corner. Just brutal from Gayle to end a horror over from the Zimbabwean captain
driven down to long off to get Gayle back on strike, much to the happiness of the wider cricketing world
sweeps away Sean powerfully through square-leg, but can't get it over the rope as he pinpoints the fielder
driven by Samuels towards the off side, but can't pick up any vacant space
looking to target midwicket with a swat, but is stopped in the deep by the man from cow corner as he brings up his 150. Is not too far away from his personal best in ODIs, with that mark at 153*
sweeps away the spinner square off the wicket to the man in the deep
worked away through the cover region now as Samuels retains the strike
slides one in on middle which is punched away by Samuels to the off side
gets a good stride in before steering away the spinner through long off
and Gayle crowns the achievement with yet another powerful pull to this one dragged by Kamungozi on middle and off. Takes him to his highest ODI score as well
clubs yet another one and bissects the gap between deep midwicket and square-leg to perfection. Forget 200, 250 looks like it could go at this rate!
bowler looking to drift this onto the legs from outside leg, but Gayle is able to flick this through backward square to get a flat six over the rope. Unbelievable strike!

and he finishes off the over to style with a loft over cow corner to just beat the fielder's boot to the rop. Gets him to 171, and there is still six overs left! We could see the first 200 outside of the subcontinent, and not from than an Indian batsman as well!
gets the man on strike with a gentle clip through long on
short of a length fractionally which allows Gayle to just sit back and club this over cow corner for another six. Didn't look like he middled it, but with bats these days, it really doesn't matter..
and Gayle now moves to the 180s with a powerful flick to this one slipping down leg, sending this one orbiting over the long leg stands

make that 15 as Gayle sends yet another out of the oval, this time clattering this flatter one from the bowler high over cow corner. Takes him to 189 now, which is the highest individual score ever by a player in a World Cup, overtaking Gary Kirsten's mark of 188* against the UAE in 1996
huge groan from the crowd as he mishits this attempted slog over cow corner. Still moves him to 190 after he takes the single on offer
now Marlon gets away a run through long on to keep the strike
gets his buddy Gayle on strike with a single through to the leg side
gets to 196 with a powerful swat high over midwicket, with this sailing ever so easily over the rope. Just a boundary away now. Also ties him with Rohit and AB for most sixes in an ODI at 16
able to slice away a single through the cover region to put him just three away from the mark
tucks away the fast bowler on the leg side as Gayle gets back on strike

and Gayle makes World Cup history to become the first non-Indian to score an ODI double hundred. His first 100 was workmanlike, his second 100 was calculated bludgeoning at its finest. Can he keep it going further? Reaches the mark after driving a full toss outside of off towards the deep extra-cover fence
it really is Gayle's day as both deep midwicket and square-leg ease up as they give up on this one that just dribbles into the rope after being pulled competently by the big Jamaican
Panyangara, coming in round the wicket, dishes up a wide down the leg side
spears in a fuller one which is driven back to him in his follow through
low full toss angling in from outside leg as this is played back to him on the full, with Panyangara doing well to stick a mitt out to stop this from passing through
now slants one well wide of off as Samuels doesn't have a chance to reach it
able to blitz away a single through extra-cover, but is restricted to just the one

sends in a full, wide delivery across the batsman which is driven straight towards mid-off. Most importantly though, it gets Gayle off strike. Marlon, who is still on 94, needs 6 to get to his hundred
another full, wide delivery going across which is driven away towards deep extra-cover
delivers a front foot no-ball, and to the wrong man, as Gayle mistimes the slog over long off. Free hit, and a chance for Samuels to get to his hundred
slaps away the bowler through the covers, as he gets the single to keep the strike next over

slanting down leg and Marlon gets himself to his 8th ODI hundred with a tickle down fine leg. Not sure how to classify this one, other than he was really, really, really determined to stay out there. That one was brought up after 143 balls...
tries to make up for the strike rate with this swat over extra-cover, but is stopped before the boundary
full toss slanting down leg as Samuels looks hurt after this hit near his knee
tries to clobber this length delivery outside of off, but is late on the swing
and they usurp the old record to establish a new mark for the highest partnership for any ODI wicket
driven firmly down to long off as the fielder puts in a splendid dive before the rope to cut off what could have been a boundary
full toss which is in that hittable zone for Samuels as he is able to drive this straight down the ground to find the boundary in a hurry
trademark Samuels slice over the covers which races away to the boundary. Got very low as he carved this one over the region
once again looks to slice, perhaps a touch more behind square, but is unable to reach this as the keeper puts in a diving stop to his right

another one slanted in across which is sent over extra-cover, and in almost appropriate fashion this has burst through the fielder stationed on the boundary to bring up a fortunate boundary for Samuels
this time slams the bowler straight down the ground, but is restricted to just the two after the diving stop before the rope from long on
Samuels in overdrive as he waits and waits on the back foot before clobbering this fuller one high over long off for a massive six. Got admirable elevation on that as it went down the ground
ends up carting away this low full toss towards long on as Samuels takes the strike
sees this slow bouncer outside of off early before powering this over cow corner with a brutal strike
fires in a full delivery on middle and leg which is dug away towards the leg side
wants two as he scythes away this fullish length over deep extra-cover, with the fielder doing well to track this one before the boundary rope
high full toss which is definitely over the waist as Gayle pummels this one straight over to mid-off. Called no-ball eventually by the umpire
another full toss which is clubbed away straight to cow corner, and this one is also over waist height, as Chatara has been pulled off by the umpire for bowling two beamers in the over
driven firmly on the up through deep extra-cover as Samuels gets the big man on strike for, what should be, the final ball of the innings

and he tries to go for the sixes record with a powerful strike down the ground to this fuller one outside of off. Gayle gets on one knee and ends up slicing this high over point, with Chigu able to come round to take a good low catch.
